document_data.caption: A map showing Mal Tamesis in Myrloch Vale.
document_data.name: Mal Tamesis
document_data.mainbody: '''Mal Tamesis''' was a small lake found on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Mal Tamesis was found near the center of [[Myrloch Vale]] just northwest of the [[Myrloch]]. Nearly half of Mal Tamesis' shoreline was covered by a small unnamed forest, while the remaining shore faced the open plains of the vale.
